subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Billed as a boon to Brazil, gleaming new stadiums rose for the World Cup — but now residents wonder how they will benefit after the last goal is scored.
snippet: Billed as a boon to Brazil, gleaming new stadiums rose for the World Cup — but now residents wonder how they will benefit after the last goal is scored.
